comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create an empty new EMF project using the wizard.
2. Add an eCore model using the wizard.
3. Add a genmodel referencing the eCore model.
4. A NPE should occur in the wizard for creating the genmodel.



More information:
The dialog box says:
Problems were encountered processing the models

Reason: The operation was interrupted due to an exception ('NullPointerException'). Check the log for further details

The details are: java.lang.NullPointerException

Adding matthew@stickledown.com to the cc list.
NB I intended this issue to be distinct from #75933, in that this issue deals with the NPE, rather than the definition of what is required of an eCore model for a genmodel.

In 2.3, the wizards tell you about all the bad things in your .ecore file so only if you fail to correct the problems it tells you about will you get into null pointer problems.  And even then, for the scenario you describe, there won't be a null pointer error with the most recent fixes in the duplicate I'm returning this against.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 192909 ***
